content: **crocheted top in drops paris piece is crocheted bottom up with vents in the sides size xs xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-913 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 250-250-300-350-350-400 g colour 16 white **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 5 mm **crochet gauge** 14 treble crochets in width and 8 5 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
